title: uTorrent Pro 3.4.8 Build 42548 Stable + Portable
description:
uTorrent Pro 3.4.8 Build 42548 Stable + Portable [4REALTORRENTZ]


uTorrent is an efficient BitTorrent client for Windows. Most of the features present in other BitTorrent clients are present in uTorrent, including bandwidth prioritization, scheduling, RSS auto-downloading, and Mainline DHT. Additionally, uTorrent supports the protocol encryption joint specification and peer exchange. Unlike many torrent clients, it does not hog valuable system resourcesâ€“typically using less than 6MB of memory, allowing you to use the computer as if it werenâ€™t there at all. 

ÂµTorrent PRO features: 

- Stream Instantly 
Watch or preview torrents as they download, without waiting for the completed file. 
- Convert, download and play in many formats 
ÂµTorrent Pro includes an HD media player or convert to play on any mobile device. 
- Premium New Features 
ÂµTorrent Pro is always adding new features. Enjoy them at no extra cost. 
- Anti-Virus Protection 
Keep your PC safe by automatically scanning downloads for viruses and malware. 
- Early Access 
Gain access to updates and cutting-edge features before anyone else. 
- No Ads 
As a Pro user and a supporter of ÂµTorrent, you can enjoy an ad-free experience. 

More Features of ÂµTorrent PRO: 

- Multiple simultaneous downloads 
- Configurable bandwidth scheduler 
- Global and per-torrent speed limiting 
- Quick-resumes interrupted transfers 
- RSS Downloader 
- Trackerless support (Mainline DHT) 

Instructions: 

1. Unpack and install 
2. Don't run 
3. Copy and replace contents of Pro folder to installation directory 
4. Done
